title: Arcane Solutions
description: Rescuing under-aged vamp bait and retrieving stolen possessions is all in a day’s work for Discord Jones.  When a gorgeous, lying bastard of an elf hires her to find an ancient book, danger takes on a whole new meaning. The book holds an unbelievably powerful spell, and ‘favored prey of demons’ becomes an unwelcome addition to her resume.
author: Gayla Drummond
